name: Skeleton Party
description:
Keep the party alive. 

Pour beers, order pizza, have important conversations with guests (and yourself).

Life can get pretty boring when you're six feet under.

Controls:

Move
ARROW KEYS Actions
WSADUse stereo
CAPS, 0, 1


Created by:

jemztones - game design, programming

Justin Tam - game design, sound, writing

Scott Cotterell - art, game design

Jake Funke - programming, game design
